document.full_text: relatives of some of the 228 people killed in a rio-paris jet crash voiced hope thursday that their two-year wait for an explanation may soon be over as experts prepared to open the aircraft's "black box" recorders.
document.title: air france crash investigators to open black boxes
lines_and_colors: relatives of some of the 228 people killed in a rio-paris jet crash voiced hope thursday that their two-year wait for an explanation may soon be over as experts prepared to open the aircraft's "black box" recorders.
